Old and new password must not be the sam: Old and new password must not be the same.
Password cannot have leading or trailing: Password cannot have leading or trailing spaces.
Password needs to be at least 8 characte: Password needs to be at least 8 characters long.
Password must contain at least one lette: Password must contain at least one letter and one number.
